text: Eteke yetiya tomaloke chalata samapta karaiba tetiya tomaloke thiya hai, bahi arau su'i thaka arasthato allahaka smarana karaiba, tara pichata yetiya tomaloke niraapada haâ€™ba tetiya yathayathabharae chalata kayema karaiba; niscaya nirdharaita samayata chalata kayema karaa muminasakalara babe arasya kartabya
